hr.fer.zemris.java.fractals

Class Newton.ComplexRootedPolynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.fractals.Newton.ComplexRootedPolynomial
  • Enclosing class:
    Newton

    public static class Newton.ComplexRootedPolynomial
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an immutable model of root-based complex polynomial.
    Author:
    Dan
